properties.description:
This query will show you if these processes will be moved or changed from the system32: svchost.exe, explorer.exe, taskhost.exe, dllhost.exe, winlogon.exe, csrss.exe , lsass.exe, services.exe, spoolsv.exe, smss.exe, msiexec.exe , dwm.exe, conhost.exe, wuauclt.exe, regsvr32.exe, taskeng.exe



This can be where an attacker changes the name of a malicious process to Masquerade or pose to be one of those legitimate process in a folder path that deviates from the normal System 32 folder
properties.query:
// Contributor: kahmadjan
// Reviewer: kahmadjan
// Reference: 
//
// Description: This query will show you if these processes will be moved or changed from the system32: svchost.exe, explorer.exe, taskhost.exe, dllhost.exe, winlogon.exe, csrss.exe , lsass.exe, services.exe, spoolsv.exe, smss.exe, msiexec.exe , dwm.exe, conhost.exe, wuauclt.exe, regsvr32.exe, taskeng.exe. This can be where an attacker changes the name of a malicious process to Masquerade or pose to be one of those legitimate process in a folder path that deviates from the normal System 32 folder
// Handling Guidance: Reach out to the user who ran the process to confirm activity and check the DeviceFileEvents table to and reference the PreviousFileName column to see if this was malicious
            
// Query Modifications: 
let suspiciousProcesses = dynamic(["svchost.exe", "explorer.exe", "taskhost.exe", "dllhost.exe", "winlogon.exe", "csrss.exe", "lsass.exe", "services.exe", "spoolsv.exe", "smss.exe", "msiexec.exe", "dwm.exe", "conhost.exe", "wuauclt.exe", "regsvr32.exe", "taskeng.exe"]);
let uncommonPaths = dynamic(["C:\\Users\\", "C:\\ProgramData\\", "C:\\Temp\\", "C:\\Windows\\Temp\\", "C:\\Windows\\System32\\drivers\\etc\\"]);
DeviceProcessEvents
| where FileName in (suspiciousProcesses) 
    and FolderPath has_any (uncommonPaths)
    and InitiatingProcessFileName !in (suspiciousProcesses) 
| extend MasqueradingReason = case(
                                  FileName == "svchost.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "svchost.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "explorer.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows"),
                                  "explorer.exe not in Windows",
                                  FileName == "taskhost.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "taskhost.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "dllhost.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "dllhost.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "winlogon.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "winlogon.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "csrss.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "csrss.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "lsass.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "lsass.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "services.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "services.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "smss.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "smss.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "spoolsv.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "spoolsv.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "conhost.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "conhost.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "wuauclt.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "wuauclt.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "dwm.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "dwm.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "taskeng.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "taskeng.exe not in System32",
                                  FileName == "regsvr32.exe" and not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32"),
                                  "regsvr32.exe not in System32",
                                  "Unknown"
                              )
| where InitiatingProcessFileName != "tmdiag.exe"
| where InitiatingProcessFileName != "svc.exe"
| project TimeGenerated, AccountName, DeviceName, MasqueradingReason, FileName, FolderPath, ProcessVersionInfoProductName, ProcessCommandLine
